section.title: How to get to this page
section.p: You can manage all of your templates from 'Manage templates' page. Click on 'Project templates' from instance Admin menu.

section.title: What you can do on this page
section.p: The Available templates page lets you -

subsection.title: View and edit details of existing templates
subsection.p: You can view and update any existing templates from this page. Click on each template you want to view or make changes of. All changes will be saved on the template.

subsection.title: Create a new template from existing project
Import previously exported projects as templates

section.p: Templates are a great way to create new projects quickly. Each template is structured with useful common concept - such as Agile, Scrum and XP. After learning quickly how to use Mingle and you can also apply new method of your own to new projects.
